question: You live in an English speaking country and you want to do some voluntary, unpaid work in a developing country. Write a letter to a company called Cultural Expeditions, which organizes such trips. In your letter:•	Explain why you want to do the voluntary work.•	State what your skills and experience are.•	Indicate where you would like to volunteer and for how long.
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest in doing unpaid voluntary work.
I would like to work in one of the developing countries like Mexico for a duration of three months.

I graduated in a masters degree in psychology and am available until I start my full-time employment. So, I decided to dedicate my leisure hours to provide assistance to the needy ones to help them succeed in their life and attain their goals.

I have been tutoring a number of high school students in subjects like English and Mathematics for over three years. I have also learned spanish online and can communicate with the mexicans without any issue. I would like to teach those subjects to children which will improve both their communication and logical skills and would be conducive to them in building a bright future.
I look forward to hearing from you.
